job.title: Senior Ruby on Rails Software Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtHi were NutscomltbrgtltstronggtWere changing the landscape of snacking on nuts dried fruit chocolate and more We planted our roots in Newark New Jersey during the Great Depression selling premium nuts on Mulberry Streets openair market Weve come quite a long way since then taking our multigenerational family business online in 1999 Even after 90 years we continue to pride ourselves in expertly sourcing the highest quality foods and treating our customers like familyltbrgtltbrgtWhats our team like Were driven collaborative and entrepreneurial Energy and passion power our business and we look for candidates who share in that excitement to help us continue to build something specialltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtThe roleltbrgtltstronggtCome help implement and deploy new features for the Nutscom warehouse operations software You will have the opportunity to make immediate contributions to our Ruby on Rails warehouse management system interact with the end users of your features and see the direct impact they have in supporting Nutscoms rapid growthltbrgtltbrgtThis software drives dozens of foodsafety sourcing production and fulfillment processes for facilities across the country Youll work on a small team with a modern codebase building topoftheline software in a domain that rarely sees innovation like this Our team has built this system from the ground up with a keen focus on producing clean and maintainable code We describe ourselves as pragmatic perfectionists always striving to produce the highest quality code while delivering new features that are absolutely critical to supporting the demanding growth of our businessltbrgtltbrgtRuby on Rails experience is key ideally in a large codebase with a focus on longterm maintainability and stability Understanding the fundamentals of good data modeling and SQL queries is important AWS and Docker experience is a plusltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtWhat Youll Bringltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligtltstronggt5 years of professional software development experienceltstronggtltligt ltligtltstronggtSubstantial experience with Ruby on Railsltstronggtltligt ltligtA track record of designing clean maintainable and well tested codeltligt ltligtSQL expertiseltligt ltligtExperience developing deploying and supporting missioncritical web applicationsltligt ltligtWillingness to communicate directly with operators using our software in the warehouse environmentltligt ltligtWillingness to improve and enforce development and Agile delivery best practicesltligt ltligtHandson experience with AWS tools and services is a plusltligt ltligtThe ability to work independently but also to collaborate with your peers in tech and other disciplines as neededltligt ltligtBS in Computer Scienceltligt ltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltstronggtltugtWhat We Offerltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligtA challenging role in a rapidly evolving businessltligt ltligtCompetitive compensation benefits and 401K Matchltligt ltligtPaid Maternity Adoption and Paternity leaveltligt ltligtAnd all the Nutscom snacks your heart desires  a 40 employee discountltligt ltbrgtltulgtltstronggtEEO STATEMENTltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtNutscom is an affirmative action and equal opportunity employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender identity gender expression national origin age protected veteran or disabled status or genetic information
